import React from 'react' function About() { return (

Welcome to the World's leading source of Climate change monitoring tool.

We gather data historical data on climate change.

We believe human being can make an impact now to prevent the continued degradation of the environment.

Our Analysis cover diverse metadata on climate implications.

) } export default About
